AAL.O,UPDATE 1-American Airlines says too early to tell Zika's impact on travel NEW YORK, Jan 29 American Airlines'  president on Friday said it is too early to tell if the rapidly spreading Zika virus will impact travel, but so far the airline has seen no material change to flight bookings. ~REFILE-American Airlines says too early to tell Zika's impact on travel NEW YORK, Jan 29 American Airlines'  president on Friday said it is too early to tell if the rapidly spreading Zika virus will impact travel, but so far the airline has seen no material change to flight bookings. ~American Airlines' fourth-quarter profit beats expectations American Airlines Group Inc  on Friday reported a fourth-quarter profit above analysts' estimates as tumbling oil prices continued to add to its bottom line. ~UPDATE 1-American Airlines' 4th-quarter profit beats expectations Jan 29 American Airlines Group Inc on Friday reported a fourth-quarter profit above analysts' estimates as tumbling oil prices continued to add to its bottom line. ~American Airlines 4th-quarter profit beats expectations Jan 29 American Airlines Group Inc on Friday reported a fourth-quarter profit above analysts' estimates as cheap fuel continued to add to its bottom line. ~

BLK,UPDATE 2-BlackRock switches benchmarks on U.S. bond ETFs NEW YORK, Jan 29 BlackRock Inc said on Friday it will change the benchmarks on four iShares Treasury exchange-traded funds (ETFs) from Barclays' Treasury bond indexes to ICE's Treasury bond indexes, effective on or after March 31. ~BlackRock switches benchmarks on U.S. bond ETFs NEW YORK, Jan 29 BlackRock Inc said on Friday it will change the benchmarks on four iShares Treasury exchange-traded funds (ETFs) from Barclays' Treasury bond indexes to ICE's Treasury bond indexes, effective on or after March 31. ~
BA,UPDATE 1-Boeing wins contract to build new Air Force One presidential jets WASHINGTON, Jan 29 Boeing Co has won a contract to start preliminary work on a new fleet of Air Force One presidential aircraft based on its 747-8 jumbo jet, the Pentagon said on Friday. ~Boeing wins deal to build new Air Force One presidential jets WASHINGTON, Jan 29 Boeing Co has won a contract to start preliminary design work on a new fleet of Air Force One presidential aircraft based on its 747-8 commercial airliner, the Pentagon said on Friday. ~Boeing 737 MAX jet successfully completes first flight Boeing Co's  737 MAX aircraft completed its first flight on Friday, taking off from rain-slick tarmac and conducting tests for about three hours before landing safely at Boeing Field in Seattle. | Video  ~UPDATE 3-Boeing 737 MAX jet successfully completes first flight Jan 29 Boeing Co's 737 MAX aircraft completed its first flight on Friday, taking off from rain-slick tarmac and conducting tests for about three hours before landing safely at Boeing Field in Seattle. ~Boeing's new 737 MAX poised to make first flight Friday Jan 29 Boeing Co's latest jetliner, an update of its best-selling 737 model, was due to take off as scheduled on Friday morning, the company said. ~
CVX,UPDATE 2-Chevron posts first loss since 2002 on crude oil plunge Jan 29 Chevron Corp reported its first quarterly loss in more than 13 years on Friday despite Wall Street's expectations for a profit, as plunging oil prices eroded profitability across all its divisions. ~Chevron reports quarterly loss on sliding oil prices Jan 29 Chevron Corp reported a fourth-quarter loss on Friday as the oil producer grappled with how best to handle plunging crude prices. ~
CL,UPDATE 1-Colgate-Palmolive sales miss on strong dollar, weak LatAm demand Jan 29 Colgate-Palmolive Co reported lower-than-expected sales for the last quarter of 2015, hurt by a strong dollar and weak demand in Latin America. ~Colgate-Palmolive posts 7.6 pct drop in 4th-qtr sales Jan 29 Colgate-Palmolive Co, the world's largest toothpaste maker, reported a 7.6 percent fall in quarterly sales as a strong dollar once again trimmed the value of sales from outside the United States and demand weakened in Latin America. ~
